com.minecolonies.configgui.title: Подешавања MineColonies
minecolonies.config.gameplay.comment: All configuration items related to the core gameplay
minecolonies.config.claim.comment: All configuration related to mod compatibility
minecolonies.config.combat.comment: All configuration items related to the combat elements of Minecolonies
minecolonies.config.compatibility.commen: All configuration related to mod compatibility
minecolonies.config.requestSystem.commen: All configurations related to the request system
minecolonies.config.commands.comment: All configurations related to the Minecolonies commands
minecolonies.config.diseasemodifier.comm: How common diseases are. 1 = Very common, 100 = extremely rare. [Default: 5]
minecolonies.config.diseases.comment: All diseases citizens can get. The name, how common it is, and all ingredients to cure it.
minecolonies.config.generatesupplyloot.c: Whether to generate supply ship/camps in chests occasionally [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.listofplantables.com: The items and item-tags that the florist can plant.
item.minecolonies.scepterlumberjack.name: Lumberjack-scepter
item.minecolonies.scepterlumberjack.rest: Area, %s is too large. Maximum restricted area for the lumberjack is %s blocks.
Lumberjack, restricted area set. Size is %s blocks. Max size is %s blocks.
minecolonies.config.names.comment: All configuration items related to the citizen names
minecolonies.config.usemiddleinitial.com: Should citizens have a middle initial?
minecolonies.config.malefirstnames.comme: Male first names to be used for colonists
minecolonies.config.femalefirstnames.com: Female first names to be used for colonists
minecolonies.config.lastnames.comment: Last names to be used for colonists
minecolonies.config.builderplaceconstruc: Should builder place construction tape? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.playergetsguidebooko: Should player get one guidebook on first join to a new world? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.allowinfinitesupplyc: Should players be able to place an infinite amount of supplychests? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.allowinfinitecolonie: Should players be allowed to abandon their colony to create a new one easily? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.allowotherdimcolonie: Should colonies in other dimensions be allowed? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.builderinfiniteresou: Should builder and miner build without resources? (this also turns off what they produce). [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.limittoonewarehousep: Should there be at max 1 warehouse per colony?. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.builderbuildblockdel: Delay after each block placement (Increasing it, increases the delay) [Default: 15]
minecolonies.config.blockminingdelaymodi: Delay modifier to mine a block (Decreasing it, decreases the delay) [Default: 500]
minecolonies.config.maxblockscheckedbybu: Amount of blocks the builder checks (to decrease lag by builder). [Default: 1000]
minecolonies.config.enableindevelopmentf: Should in development features be enabled (might be buggy). [Default: false]
Should citizen name tags be rendered? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.growthmodifier.comme: Child growth modifier, default on avg they take about 60min to grow (at 1.0x modifier). Setting to 5 = 5x as fast. [Default: 1]
minecolonies.config.workersalwaysworkinr: Should workers work during the rain? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.sendenteringleavingm: Should Players be sent entering/leaving colony notifications? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.allowplayerschematic: Should player made schematics be allowed [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.allowglobalnamechang: Should players be allowed to change names? -1 for false, 0 for specific groups, 1 for true. [Default: 1]
minecolonies.config.holidayfeatures.comm: Should special holiday content be displayed? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.updaterate.comment: AI Update rate, increase to improve performance. [Default: 1]
minecolonies.config.dirtfromcompost.comm: Quantity of dirt per Compost filling. [Default: 1]
minecolonies.config.luckyblockchance.com: Chance to get a lucky block in percent. [Default: 1]
minecolonies.config.fixorphanedchunks.co: Automatically fix orphaned chunks which were caused by chunk loading and saving issues. [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.restrictbuilderunder: If the builder should be slower underground or as fast as anywhere else. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.fisherspongechance.c: Chance to get a sponge drop for the fisherman starting at level 4. [Default: 0.1]
minecolonies.config.minthleveltoteleport: The minimum level a townhall has to have to allow teleportation to other colonies. [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.suggestbuildtoolplac: Suggest build tool usage when trying to place a building without build tool. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.teleportbuffer.comme: Time until a next teleport can be executed (in seconds). [Default: 120]
minecolonies.config.oplevelforserver.com: Which level counts as op level on the server. [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.autodeletecoloniesin: Sets the amount of hours until a colony will be deleted after not seeing it's mayor, set to zero to disable. [Default: 0]
minecolonies.config.autodestroycolonyblo: Sets weither or not Colony structures are destroyed automatically. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusertpcomma: Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc rtp' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusecolonytp: Can Player Use Colony TP Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc colony teleport' command? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.canplayeruseallytown: Can Player Teleport to allied colonies? [Default:true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusehometpco: Can Player Use Home TP Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc home' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusecitizeni: Can Player Use Citizen Info Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc citizens info' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayeruselistciti: Can Player Use List Citizens Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc citizens list' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayeruseshowcolo: Can Player Use Show Colony Info Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc colony info' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusekillciti: Can Player Use Kill Citizens Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc citizens kill' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayeruseaddoffic: Can Player Use Add Officer Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc colony addOfficer' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.canplayerusedeleteco: Can Player Use Delete Colony Command
Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc colony delete' command? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.numberofattemptsfors: Number of Attempts for Safe TP
Amount of attempts to find a save rtp. [Default: 4]
minecolonies.config.workingrangetownhall: Working Range of Townhall in Chunks
Colony size (radius in chunks around central colony chunk). Only for the static mode. [Default: 8]
minecolonies.config.mintownhallpadding.c: The minimum distances between town halls for dynamic colony sizes (used as default initial claim too). [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.restrictcolonyplacem: Should the min/max distance from spawn also affect colony placement? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.enabledynamiccolonys: Should the colony have a fixed radius or should it be dynamic. [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.protectvillages.comm: Should players be allowed to build their colonies over existing villages? [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.dobarbariansspawn.co: Whether or not to spawn barbarians. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.spawnbarbariansize.c: The spawn size of a barbarian horde. [Default: 5]
minecolonies.config.maxbarbariansize.com: The max size of a barbarian horde. [Default: 20]
minecolonies.config.dobarbariansbreakthr: Whether or not to barbarians can break, scale, bridge obstacles. [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.averagenumberofnight: Average Number of Nights Between Raids
The average amount of nights between raids. [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.minimumnumberofnight: Minimum Number of Nights Between Raids
The minimum number of nights between raids. [Default: 1]
Should Citizens call guards for help when attacked? default:true
minecolonies.config.rangerenchants.comme: Should Guard Rangers benefit from Power/Smite/Bane of Arthropods enchants? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.pvp_mode.comment: Turn on Minecolonies pvp mode, attention (colonies can be destroyed and can be griefed under certain conditions). [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.daysuntilpirateships: Days until the pirate ships despawn again. [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.maxyforbarbarians.co: Max Y level for Barbarians to spawn. [Default: 200]
minecolonies.config.enablecolonyprotecti: Should the colony protection be enabled? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.turnoffexplosionsinc: Independent from the colony protection, should explosions be turned off? [Default: true]
minecolonies.config.specialpergroup.comm: Players who have special permission (Patreons for example)
minecolonies.config.freetointeractblocks: Blocks players should be able to final ForgeConfigSpec.IntValueeract with in any colony (Ex vending machines)
minecolonies.config.pathfindingdebugdraw: Draw pathfinding paths (might be laggy). [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.pathfindingmaxthread: Amount of additional threads to be used for pathfinding. [Default: 2]
Max amount of Nodes(positions) to map during pathfinding. Lowering increases performance, but might lead to pathing glitches. [Default: 5000]
minecolonies.config.enabledebuglogging.c: Should the request system prfinal ForgeConfigSpec.IntValue out debug information? Useful in case of malfunctioning of set system. [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.maximalretries.comme: The maximal amount of tries that the request system will perform for retryable requests. Higher increases server load. [Default: 3]
The amount of ticks between retries of the request system for retryable requests. Lower increases server load. [Default: 1200]
minecolonies.config.maximalbuildingstoga: The maximal amount of buildings the Delivery Man should try to gather before attempting a drop off at the warehouse. [Default: 6]
minecolonies.config.minimalbuildingstoga: The minimal amount of buildings the Delivery Man should try to gather before attempting a drop off at the warehouse. [Default: 3]
minecolonies.config.creativeresolve.comm: Should the request system creatively resolve (if possible) when the player is required to resolve a request. [Default: false]
minecolonies.config.canplayeruseresetcom: Should the player be allowed to use the '/mc colony rs reset' command? [Default: false]

entity.worker.inventoryfullchestfull: Молим Вас, направите ми места за грађевински материјал. Не могу да испразним складиште.

entity.builder.messagebuildtoolow: %s is too low, Please raise the building above Y 0.

entity.citizen.demandsjob: %s захтева да му се нађе посао и постаје јако узнемирен јер не ради ништа.
entity.citizen.nohouse: %s би желео да има кућу којој би се враћао сваке ноћи.
entity.citizen.demandshouse: %s захтева кућу у којој би живео и постаје јако нервозан због тога што је нема.

com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.buildtool.n: Колиба није пронађена у твом инвентару.
com.minecolonies.coremod.error.supplyche: Већ сте поставили брод за снабдевање или испоставу за снабдевање!
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.assigning.d: Одаберите становника који ће живети овде.
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.townhall.me: You've encountered some mercenaries nearby your Colony. They offer to help a while with defending your colony. A price they did not name, but you get the feeling that they will not leave bare-handed. Hire at your own risk!
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.townhall.hi: Choose which recruitment package you want to send.
Citizens stats increase from Hay - Books - Emeralds to Diamonds.
Using one package increases the price of all with each purchase.
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.debugscreen: Next colony is %d blocks away! (Too close to found a new one)
Молимо Вас да саградите колибу како бисте могли да упослите радника.
Прерасподели стражара на неки други посао:
Try to retreat on low health:
Одаберите шта треба да се чува.
Молимо Вас да направите простора у складишту како бисте користили ову функцију.
Десни клик на блок, како бисте додали путању патроле. Двоструки клик ако желите да затворите овај алат.
Десни клик на блок како бисте подесили шта треба да се чува.

Подесите %s као нови задатак за стражара%s.
com.minecolonies.coremod.job.guard.toold: Завршено је додавање нових локација на које се шаље патрола.
com.minecolonies.coremod.workerhuts.reca: Опозив није успео - молимо Вас да направите мало простора око те локације.
entity.worker.pickaxerequest: Потребан ми је пијук, од нивоа квалитета од %s до %s.

entity.worker.enchantedtoolrequest: Потребно ми је %s са максималним нивоом магије %d.
com.minecolonies.coremod.warehouse.full: Складиште је препуњено, молимо Вас да га надоградите или да ослободите мало места.
com.minecolonies.coremod.network.message: План је превелик, не може бити већи од %s бајта

com.minecolonies.coremod.mercenary.steal: A mercenary just stole %s from a building!

item.supplycampdeployer.invalid.water_bl: Placing a supply ship requires water under the ship. These blocks must be water: %s.
item.supplycampdeployer.invalid.solid_bl: За постављање кампа за снабдевање, неопходно је обезбедити равно земљиште, величине 16*17 квадрата, без траве или цвећа..  Блокови морају бити чврсти: %s.

item.supplycampdeployer.invalid.inside_e: Не можете поставити свој камп за снабдевање поред постојеће колоније.
com.minecolonies.coremod.job.guard.toolc: Ван домета стражарске куле, молимо да надоградите кулу.
com.minecolonies.coremod.saturation.0: Умирем од глади, не могу више да радим
com.minecolonies.coremod.saturation.3: Прилично сам гладан, једва да сам користан

com.minecolonies.coremod.saturation.7: Још сам сит, мада бих морао да једем ускоро

block.minecolonies.blockhutbarracks.name: Касарне
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.barracks.sp: During raids you can hire spies here, to infiltrate the enemy lines. Those then let you know enemy positions although they demand some gold as payment. Put the gold into the barracks inventory to automatically pay them.
com.minecolonies.coremod.worker.needbarr: Молимо Вас да прво унапредите Касарне.
block.minecolonies.blockhutcook.name: Ресторан
com.minecolonies.coremod.ai.nochairs: Ресторан нема слободних места за мене!
com.minecolonies.coremod.ai.norestaurant: Молим Вас, саградите ресторан или ми набавите нешто за јело!
com.minecolonies.coremod.ai.nohospital: Please build a hospital I have the %s and need to be cured with: %s

item.supplychestdeployer.invalid: Морате поставити на водену површину одговарајуће величине.
item.supplychestdeployer.missing: Јел' ти то покушаваш мене да превариш?! Поново хоћеш да узмеш тај брод за снабдевање?
Преименовање није успело: 2 становника не могу имати исто име!

block.minecolonies.blockhutsmeltery.name: Топионица
com.minecolonies.coremod.mourning: У колонији се догодио смртни случај. Колонија ће сутра оплакивати %s.
event.minecolonies.raidmessage2: §4Грађани су чули гласине о хајдуцима у близини %s!
event.minecolonies.raidmessage3: §4Оседлај коња, каубоју! Они ђавољи разбојници долазе по %s вечерас!
event.minecolonies.raidmessage4: §4Велика хорда јаше ка %s, не шале се!
event.minecolonies.raidmessage_p1: §4Тајанствени морнари су виђени близу %s, како плове на малом једрењаку, размисли о томе да их потопиш.
event.minecolonies.raidmessage_p2: §4Међу становницима се шире приче о пиратима виђеним у близини %s, имају и брод, боље би ти било да их нападнеш први!
event.minecolonies.raidmessage_p3: §4Аррргх Друже! Неки проклети пирати долазе по %s вечерас, допловили су до нас и наставиће да нас нападају све док не потопимо њихову каравелу!
event.minecolonies.raidmessage_p4: §4Велика хорда пирата плови ка %s и не шали се! Талас непријатеља ће нас запљуснути ако не уништимо њихову галију!
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.townhall.tp: Да ли заиста желите да се телепортујете на: %s [YES]
com.minecolonies.coremod.cook.full: Не може се дати још хране раднику, јер су му залихе препуњене.
block.minecolonies.blocktimberframe_oak_: Лево-десна дијагонала, оквир од светлог храста
Десно-лева дијагонала, оквир од светлог храста

Лево-десна дијагонала, оквир од тропске грађе
block.minecolonies.blocktimberframe_dark: Десно-лева дијагонала, оквир од тамног храста
Лево-десна дијагонала, оквир од тамног храста
com.minecolonies.coremod.dimension.no: Није Вам дозвољено да поставите колонију са другачијим димензијама (Изазвано вредношћу конфигурације)
com.minecolonies.coremod.max.schematic.r: Највећа величина шеме у износу од %d блокова је достигнута.
com.minecolonies.coremod.barbarians.kill: Успешно сте одбранили своју колонију против уљеза!
com.minecolonies.coremod.tooclose: Превише близу граница, потребно је бити барем %d блокова далеко.
com.minecolonies.coremod.toofar: Предалеко од граница света, неопходно је бити максимално %d блокова далеко.
entity.composter.noitems: Молимо Вас, дефинишите листу ствари које ће бити компостиране.
com.minecolonies.coremod.pvp.townhall.br: Чувај се! %s почиње да проваљује у градску већницу!
Узбуна!!! %s је провалило у градску већницу. Проценат је %d%%! Када број достигне 100%%, већница ће бити изгубљена!!!
block.minecolonies.blockhutlibrary.name: Библиотека
com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.resourcescr: Није било могуће пронаћи регистрованог градитеља, молимо Вас да на постојећу градитељску кућу кликнете шифт-десни клик.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.suppli: §6 Добродошли у Рударске колоније. Сада када имате своје залихе, шта мислите о томе да потражите лепо место да поставите своју градску већницу и оснујете своју колонију ... мада је врло далеко од села, могуће је.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.colony: §6 Шире се гласине о новој колонији. Ускоро ће се први насељеници придружити Вашој новооснованој колонији, ако има довољно простора око градске већнице. (Искусни магистрати могу искључити ове корисне поруке у оквиру блока градске већнице.)
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.first_: §6 Први насељеник је пристигао у Вашу колонију. Требало би да поставите градитељску кућицу како бисте отпочели изградњу насеобине.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.builde: §6 Сјајно одабрана позиција градитељске кућице. Ипак, то није довољно. Морате да јој приступите и кликнете дугме за изградњу! Ускоро ће ваш НПЦ направити нове структуре за село.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.built_: §6 Док Ваш градитељ ради, на другој страници интерфејса за градњу можете проверити који ресурси су му потребни.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.builde: §6 Након што завршимо кућицу за градитеља, требало би да сву своју пажњу усмеримо на производњу ресураса. Предлажемо Вам да упослите дрвосечу или рудара.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.resour: §6 Производња ресураса кошта пуно енергије и то насељеницима отвара апетит. Можда бисте желели да имате фармера или рибара.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.food_p: §6 Ваш град доживљава прави процват! Како бисте побољшали продуктивност, можда би требало да унапредите зграде.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.four_c: §6 Сви Ваши иницијални насељеници су упослени. Како бисте привукли још досељеника, требало би да саградите или унапредите куће за становање.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.all_ci: §6 Видим да сви ви досељеници сада имате лепе домове. Ако саградите или унапредите још једну колибу за становање, добићете новог досељеника, али имајте у виду да то привлачи и варваре.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.four_c: §6 The last initial citizen arrived at your colony, to spawn new children build a citizen hut and assign a male and female citizen.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.five_c: §6 Нови досељеник је стигао у Вашу колонију и са собом је донео и гласине о варварским шпијунима који траже Ваше село које расте. Требало би да саградите одбрамбену кулу!
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.six_ci: §6 Како насеље расте, расте и одговорност. Требало би да размотрите о томе да отворите ресторан како би сви становници били сити.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.seven_: §6 Насељеници Вас пожурују да изградите складиште. Тако ће моћи да олакшају свој ранац, а последично ће моћи брже и ефикасније да преносе робу!
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.wareho: §6 Саградили сте складиште. Ипак, Ваши људи су толико преоптерећени да не могу да стигну да га напуне. Саградите неколико кућица за доставу како бисте привукли достављаче. До 5 достављача може радити у једном складишту.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.eight_: §6 Грађани тврде да њихове вештине утичу на брзину напретка кроз нивое. Становнике можете упослити и ручно, ако тако подесите у оквиру градске већнице. Нојбоље пословне вештине ће бити подвучене током процеса запошљавања.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.manual: §6 Радници се жале што морају далеко да пешаче до радног места. Можете их ручно населити у жељене кућице, ако је та опција укључена у оквиру подешавања градске већнице.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.nine_c: §6 Како колонија расте, све је већи терет на плећима радника. Требало би да размислите о томе да унапредите радничке зграде.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.twenty: §6 Шпијун-варварин је ухваћен на улазу у колонију и чини се да је део веће групе. Размислите о томе да саградите касарне како бисте могли да одбраните колонију.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.not_en: §6 Изградња више кућица за становање у односу на број расположивих радних места, имаће лош утицај на расположење грађана.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.newchi: §6 A new child is now happily living in your Colony!
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.childg: %s grew up and wants a job now.
com.minecolonies.coremod.progress.hireci: §6 Your recruitment package was accepted, a new Citizen arrived!

advancements.minecolonies.root.title: MineColonies - Рударске колоније
advancements.minecolonies.root.descripti: Start off MineColonies by crafting a Supply Camp or Ship and placing it via right clicking the item on the ground, this will open up the MineColonies Advancements tab!
advancements.minecolonies.place_townhall: Now's the time to start your colony, Grab that build tool and TownHall block and find a nice clear area, right click with the Build Tool to select the style you want, where you want it, and other nifty things!
advancements.minecolonies.create_build_r: Great, you've started your colony! To start building your colony up you need to craft & place a builder down (Use the build tool again!), hire a builder (Usually Automatic), and then tell them to build their building!
advancements.minecolonies.click_gui_butt: Now that you've told your builder what to do, check out his Requests tab to see what resources or tools he needs and fulfill one of them by clicking that fulfill button!
advancements.minecolonies.citizen_eat_fo: Citizens, much like you, Need to eat to be able to work, put some food in your citizen's inventory and they'll eat it when they need to!
advancements.minecolonies.building_add_r: If you're anything like us, you're probably going to get sick of having to craft everything for your workers, right now you can teach your builder 2x2 recipes, go ahead and teach them how to craft a torch!
advancements.minecolonies.complete_build: Building the Builder
Make sure to keep your builder fed, fulfill and requests, and he should start and finish building your first hut!
advancements.minecolonies.citizen_eat_fo: So this is what kind of leader you are, feeding your citizens Rotten Flesh? Shame, Shame, Shame!
advancements.minecolonies.complete_build: Build the Lumberjack
Now that you've got that awesome Builder you're going to want to start gathering wood for more huts! Complete building a Lumberjack Hut (Don't forget your build tool for placing!)
Build the Miner
No doubt you're wanting to get some of those tasty ores and some cobble for crafting and building with, Complete building a Mine Hut (Again, don't forget to use your build tool!),
Build Protection
Once you get to 5 citizens in your colony, other entities might take notice of your growing town, make sure to build and hire a Guard to protect against these creatures!
Build a Farm

To get started with some good food production for your citizens, you're going to want to build a Farm for wheat. You'll also want to place down a Field block once you've got your farmer to mark where to farm.
Home Sweet Home
Your citizens need a place to live! Build them a citizen hut, each level facilitates one citizen.
The Centrepiece

Once you've got your town setup nicely with a good flow of resources you might want to think about building your Town Hall, there are only a couple benefits of this currently, but it's a cool centre piece!
advancements.minecolonies.colony_populat: You're going to need to get more citizens if you want to get things done! Children will be born when two citizens of opposite gender are in the same house during the night, children need to be fed and sleep well to grow up!
advancements.minecolonies.complete_build: Storage
I'm sure at this point you're wanting to start automating stuff right? Well first we've got to place and build a Warehouse to store all those goodies we're getting in a central location!
Requesting Items,
Now that we've got a good central storage location, lets start automatically answering citizen requests! Build a Delivery Man's hut to have them respond to Worker's requests.
Crafting Wood!,
With the Delivery Person by your side, you can now start using crafting workers! We recommend starting off with the sawmill, place and build one to start your new crafting experience!
advancements.minecolonies.building_add_r: Now that you've unlocked 3x3 crafting with your sawmill, teach them how to craft a door! Note: Crafters will only craft on requests, and have a limit on what they can craft, see their info tab in their hut for more.
advancements.minecolonies.complete_build: Such a Stoner
A Stonemason can craft 3x3 recipes using Stone as their main ingredient, build one to take advantage of their skill!
Smelt that ore!
Smeltery workers are pretty awesome, they'll smelt your ores for you! And, at higher levels they can get pretty efficient....
It's getting Hot in here
In order for your stonemason to make stone bricks and things like that you're going to need some Stone, place and build a Stone Smeltery to automate the creation of that resource and more!
Get Baked
Your citizens need some carbs in their lives, build a baker to automatically create bread for them!
Good ol' Smithy
Most citizens need some form of tool, and crafting those can be a very specialised process, Build the Blacksmith to allow the creation of those tools!
Building an Army
If you really want to protect your colony, you're going to need a whole lot more guards, building a barracks will allow you to hire a lot more in a much smaller space!
Beautiful Towers
Now you've got your barracks, you need to build the Barracks Towers inside it, these towers are locked to the same level as the barracks and will increase their max guards every level!
A Poultry Sum of Meat
Chickens may be noisy, but they're also tasty! Build a Chicken Herder to bring in those sweet chicken legs. Don't forget to gather up some chickens in their stable!
Taking Knight classes

If you want to truly protect your citizens you're going to need well trained knights, build a Combat Academy and assign a citizen to it to increase his guard levels without the risk of losing their life!
Fertile Lands
A composter will take your left over saplings, leaves, and like items and expose them to the elements, doing this will produce fertilizer for your crops!
Feeding the Masses
Building a restaurant will give your citizens a place to go to get food, the cook will cook any meats needed and give food items to your citizens, and even you!
YeeeeHaww!
Build a cowboy to bring in that tasty tasty beef, remember you'll need to bring the cows to your Cowboy for them to be usable.
I'm crushed
Building a crusher will enable you to get things like Gravel from cobblestone!
Something smells Fishy
Build a fisherman close to water to bring in those deep sea morsels
Higher Learning
If you want more skilled labour you'd best build a Library to teach your citizens!
Mary had a little Lamb
Sometimes you really need some soft wool in your life, Build a Shepherd to take advantage of those poor unsuspecting sheep!
Diamond in the Rough
Sometimes you'll find goodies inside those crappy other blocks, Build a sifter to see if you can take advantage of that!
Getting the Bacon
Nobody can resist bacon, build a Swine Herder so that your citizens don't miss out!
Level Up!
In order to upgrade other huts beyond level 1, you'll need to have a builder that's been upgraded!
advancements.minecolonies.colony_populat: 10 Citizens means more workers, and more workers means more resources!
25 Citizens is a lot, I hope you're keeping them alive!
50 Citizens is enough to have almost 2 of every worker, Wow!
advancements.minecolonies.complete_build: Double Trouble!
A level 3 Smeltery has a 100% chance of doubling ore output, nice!
Ore Tripling
A level 5 Smeltery has a chance of tripling every ore output, the chance is equal to the Worker's Level!
A Building to be Proud Of
While there's not a lot of benefit to having a level 5 Town hall it sure does look pretty!
Bull's Eye
While Knights are pretty great, they're even better when they've got backup in the form of archers, better train some of those as well!
Floral Arrangements
The floral hut will use compost, or other types of "bonemeal" to grow you all those pesky flowers your buildings tend to want!
Enchanting Experience
The enchanter hut will consume Ancient tomes and Other workers experience to produce enchanted books for your personal usage!

com.minecolonies.coremod.research.alread: Research already started, please refresh the User Interface
com.minecolonies.coremod.research.haveto: Build a University and research the Barracks to unlock this Building first!
com.minecolonies.coremod.info.builder.0:
The builder is the heart of your colony, without it you wouldn't ever be able to get anything done!
 Every hut worker has to have their building built to at least level 1 before they can do anything, except the builder, the builder at level 0 (no hut) is able to build one thing, their own hut.

 In order for your builder to build or upgrade a hut that isn't their own, their hut must be at least the same level as the other hut, e.g. their hut must be level 3 or above to build a level 3 hut.
com.minecolonies.coremod.info.builder.1:
Now let's cover builder restrictions:

 1. Builders (and most workers in general) unlock certain tool levels per their hut level:
   lvl 0. Wood/Gold Tools
   lvl 1. Stone Tools
   lvl 2. Iron Tools
   lvl 4. Diamond Tools
   lvl 5. Enchanted Tools

 2. Builders have a maximum range of 100 blocks for buildings for automatic assignment, if your building is outside that range, in the top right of the build building UI you can select which builder to assign to a building
com.minecolonies.coremod.info.builder.2:
Now let's cover some frequently asked questions:

 Q 1. I'm seeing an item in the Required Resources page that seems unobtainable, or requires Silk Touch?
   A 1. Things like Air, Dirt Paths, and other blocks will show up in the required resources tab from time to time, while they do show up focus mainly on your builder's Request tab, he'll usually request the correct block and convert it accordingly (e.g. request Dirt and then use a shovel on it).
com.minecolonies.coremod.info.builder.3:
As all workers the builder levels up while building.
 With higher levels the builders speed increases. The higher the hut level is the quicker they level up. 
 However, their level is capped by the level of their home. Thus, if they are unhappy with their living conditions they will stop leveling until you provide them with better housing.
com.minecolonies.coremod.info.lumberjack:
The lumberjack is a very simple worker, give him an axe and he'll cut down any trees around him, he'll also replant a sapling where the tree was if he has any.
 If you wish to apply restrictions on what trees he can or can't cut, take a look at the second page.
 Even cooler is the third page, here you can tell the lumberjack to not replant saplings, or you can tell him to be restricted to a certain area (selected with the tool given by the third button on the page).

Now that we've covered that, let's cover restrictions:

 1. Lumberjacks unlock certain tool levels per their hut level:
   lvl 0. Wood/Gold Tools
   lvl 1. Stone Tools
   lvl 2. Iron Tools
   lvl 4. Diamond Tools
   lvl 5. Enchanted Tools

 2. Lumberjacks are able to search for trees within a 150 blocks of their worker (not the hut), while searching they start with a 50 block search range and then increase that range by 5 when they do not find a tree.

3. The definition of a "Tree" in Minecraft is pretty hazy at best, we've done our best to define a tree, but in some cases it may not be enough. Generally we define a tree as a log and leaves (within a near vicinity), due to this some of your huts or decorations may be affected by the lumberjack, to counter this you can place a piece of Cobblestone below a log to mark it as "not a tree".

As all workers the lumberjack levels up while building.
 Similar to the builder, with higher levels their speed increases. The higher the hut level is the quicker they level up. 
 However, their level is capped by the level of their home. Thus, if they are unhappy with their living conditions they will stop leveling until you provide them with better housing.
